name: RTK14 EP: Scenario for War Chronicles Mode - 3rd Wave: "The Battle for Hebei"
summary: A scenario where Cao Cao, Yuan Shang, and Yuan Tan fight to take control of Hebei. Cao Cao's army enters the newly occupied Ye and is on the verge of cornering the armies of Yuan Shang and Yuan Tan. Numerous obstacles lie ahead to suppress Hebei, so be sure to overcome them with the plentiful military strength.
